td.content: s:patient presents with severe dyspnea x 2 weeks. pt also complains of severe fatigue, severe easy fatigability. he is a male aged 30 ys. o:Height 74 in, Weight 135 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17 a:Hemolytic Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to hematology.

td.content: s:patient with C/O moderate denial of blood disorders, moderate denial of asthma and moderate fatigue. patient is a 30 yo male. he has a history of smoking describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 5 years in his past o:Height 73 in, Weight 131 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14, Skin = pallor, Skin = pale, no petechiae a:Hemolytic Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to hematology.

s:a white M ergonomist aged 30 ys complains of moderate fatigue, moderate denial of asthma and moderate denial of blood disorders. NKDA. he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking drinks daily o:Height 74 in, Weight 135 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16, Skin = pallor, Skin = pale, no petechiae a:Hemolytic Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed cyclophosphamide - 100 mg daily, and ordered Plasmapheresis - blood.
